title: Welcome to Genie!
msg: Congratulations on downloading Genie, every child's best friend in their learning journey.

title: New Genie Lessons Every Day!
msg: Genie has stories, worksheets, and games! Download a new lesson today!

msg: Download "Take Off", the game that teaches mathematics as you play!

msg: Genie has hundreds of Lessons. New ones are added every day! Get a new lesson now!

msg: You can send Genie lessons to your friend using ShareIT, Xender and more. Share Genie now!

title: Genie for every child!
